name: Delirium (itch) (Iarin)
description:
"You wake up alone in a room. It is dark outside. Looking out the window you can see just trees and a figure with eyes glowing and a lit cigarette. You can’t open the windows. All that you have on you is your pocket knife and your journal. The door is locked... you must escape."

Delirium is an escape room game following the story and inner conflict of a retired detective self driven into borderline insanity due to his tragic past and loneliness, developing a split personality without knowing it. This pushes his newly formed personality into creating a case, a new mystery for his true self, unveiling to himself, bit by bit, his condition.

Credits
Concept, Art, Story, Game Design: Lorin-Iarin Timinger
Programming, Sound: Teodor-Florin Manghiuc
Music: Lucas King
